name: Dirty Grandpa - Unrated: I Got Nothin' To Hide: A Look at Daytona's Most Vibrant Dealer
detailed_description: “Tan Pam” is that guy that went to Daytona Beach for Spring Break and never left. Now he has become the local drug dealer that everyone knows and cannot escape. This piece explores the psychedelic and bizarre world of “Tan Pam” and a look at how actor Jason Mantzoukas brings him to life.
